system.purpose: Finds safe warp and realspace travel routes.
system.careerPreferences: Seneschal, Navigator, Explorers, or other scholars.
system.subordinates: Navigator Archivists, Librarium keepers, auger operators
system.importantSkills: Trader (Astrographer), Navigation (Stellar and Warp), Forbidden Lore (Navigators)
system.effect: +10 to all Awareness and Perception Checks made during Warp Navigation and when detecting Stellar Phenomena.
